name: Air Cruise
description: I never tried a game jam. I dunno why. Maybe it's just because i'm a touch sensitive about my works and always spend way more time than neccisary pollishing them beyond reason, which is probably why i never finish anything. So i decided to test that theory. i made this in two days, and it is horrible. But it's mine, and i'm honestly not even all that ashamed of it. It was more a learning experience than anything else, but it's cute regardless.
